base.name: EdgeDetection
base.description: Outputs True when it detects the signal transition conditions specified by user (e.g. rising edge).

parameter_definitions.name: edge_detection
parameter_definitions.description: Defines the type of edge that is detected.

parameter_definitions.name: initial_state
parameter_definitions.description: An edge detection detects a change in a signal, so it needs an 'old value' to compare against the 'new value', this is the initial value of 'old value'.
